turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there. I'd like to order some pizza from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I'd like three medium pizzas gluten-free crust on all. I would like one pepperoni, one meat lovers and one

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 medium, gluten free pizzas, one pepperoni, one meat lovers and one with spinach, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would be picking it up.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
